review:
I am under his care from 1999 after my surgery of double valve replacement. Extremely happy with the care and attention I get during my follow-up. His precription is invaluable. Strongly recommend Dr Pradeep Jain to patients requiring cardiac  problems. 
SQ WAJAHAT.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Since 1996; I am under his treatment. I lost hope of life at the age of 40 but still active at 65 only due to him. His memory and treatment is remarkable. He has full command on his expertise. Hundreds of life would have saved by him. Above all; he has no temptation. I wish may he live long for service to humanity.
